DOC.brief_summary: The objective of the study is to test the effects of a herbal supplement, Phytalgic, on the symptoms of osteoarthritis of the knee or hip, in patients with OA using NSAIDs or analgesics on a regular basis.
DOC.criteria: knee or hip osteoarthritis regular NSAIDs/analgesic treatment signed inform consent incapacity to understand study irregular NSAID treatment
